meanings.sent1: The uncharged battery couldn't power the flashlight.
meanings.sent2: The phone was uncharged, so it couldn't make any calls.
meanings.sent3: The uncharged laptop felt left out during the power outage.
meanings.sent4: Her uncharged enthusiasm for the project was evident in her lackluster presentation.
meanings.sent5: The uncharged atmosphere in the room made it feel eerie and still.

meanings.sent1: He was uncharged in the investigation, proving his innocence.
meanings.sent2: The uncharged suspect was released from custody.
meanings.sent3: The uncharged individual was the only one without a crime to confess.
meanings.sent4: Her uncharged record allowed her to pass the background check easily.
meanings.sent5: The uncharged man walked freely, knowing he had done nothing wrong.

meanings.sent1: The uncharged gun posed no threat to anyone.
meanings.sent2: The soldier checked that his rifle was uncharged before cleaning it.
meanings.sent3: The uncharged weapon was just a heavy metal stick in his hands.
meanings.sent4: The uncharged cannon stood silent on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The uncharged bullets were useless in the empty magazine.
